title: Investigation and spec writing for Sensitivitiy Metadata
body:
## Motivation

#8400 needs investigation (and possible spike) discovering possible implementation and delivery strategies, defining the scope and dependencies

## Expected outputs
- Internal idea paper, defining the scope and dependencies
- Review and signoff by stakeholders (Eng, PM, possibly 1ES?)
- (optional) spike exploring the viability and limitations - agreement on limitations with PM
- Tasks/Stories proposal
